title: Smart Data Models - ExcST2A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE ST2A static excitation system - another lead-lag block added to match  the model defined by WECC.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcST2A

efdmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum field voltage (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 120. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc).  Typical Value = 1.82. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gains (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit gain coefficient (Ki).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit gain coefficient (Kp).  Typical Value = 4.88. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 0.7. Default: 0

uelin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL input (UELin). true = HV gate false = add to error signal. Typical Value = false. Default: False

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator outputs (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator outputs (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0
